data.body:
Sure, no problem. When I sold mine on SEA server (it was around 700k at the time) it took less than a day. There's pretty good volume on global now! Best to dump it before any double ET drop events come about. That will make the price nosedive and it will never really recover. 

Another useful price check website, where you can see volume vs price:
https://global.poporing.life/?search=Raccoon_leaf
Holy shit, thank you for your this. Saving me from logging onto my sea acc every time to price check when i make a big purchase.
Make a list of monsters you can one hit & pick the one giving most income potential (loot &or card price). Check greedy shop daily, & farm edelweiss if he happens to sells expensive stuff
